is an abstract class. When you create a notification from a payload dictionary, the
method returns an instance of the appropriate subclass. Similarly, when you fetch notifications from a container, you receive instances of a concrete subclass.

The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
